text:
Booking.com | Amsterdam, Netherlands | ON-SITE, VISA SPONSORSHIP, RELOCATION

Booking.com is the largest online accommodation service with 1.5M+ total active properties available in 220+ countries.

Help us make travel industry better, we need smart people to implement boldest ideas on global scale!

Multiple round interview process is pretty standard: home-task -> phone call -> on-site (we pay to fly you in!)

Dutch government cuts off 30% of taxes for expats, which is a great addition to your salary! Bunch of perks like discounts for hotels and occasional free travels! If you have any questions feel free to reach out to me by the email in my profile.
